name: 地質科學論文寫作
description: This course will focus on the oral and written communication of scientific work. The students will be asked to write four term papers on predetermined topics and present them on a monthly basis.
syllabus:
【18 Weeks】

Weeks 1-4 Topic 1: Introduction to presentations and writing. Students will select a topic and prepare a short review paper including a 20 minute presentation.

Weeks 5-9 Topic 2: Students will select a topic and prepare a short review paper including a 20 minute presentation.

Weeks 10-13 Topic 3: Students will select a topic and prepare a short review paper including a 20 minute presentation.

Weeks 14-18 Topic 4: Students will select a topic and prepare a short review paper including a 20 minute presentation.

methodologies.note: Lectures will be conducted on a regular basis to ensure students are up to date on their presentation skills and writing techniques.
Group discussions will occur on a monthly basis on specific topics.
Monthly presentations will be required on a predetermined topic
Monthly term papers will be required on a predetermined topic

grading.note: Students must ask questions and discuss topics.
Each case study will require a paper and presentation.
